document_data.name: Tower of Argûl
document_data.mainbody: The '''Tower of Argûl''' was residence of [[wizard]] [[Argûl Marammas]] of [[Suzail]] in the mid-to-late 14{{th}}  century [[DR]].
document_data.Location: Argûl's abode stood to the west of Suzail's [[Horngate]] next to the city's northwest wall.
document_data.History: The tower was the destination for those seeking magic scrolls from Argûl Marammas's collection or custom-scribed by the wizard.
